post:
Outstanding OpenVz & Unmetered Xen Virtual Private Servers!
Flexible packages, either powered by Xen or OpenVZ with basic managed or fully managed!
Send us ticket now if you have questions or visit us @ CH Hosting for more info.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Why CH Hosting?
* Instant Automated FREE Setup, login to your VPS within few minutes after payment cleared. EXCEPT you failed the verification.
* Intel Quad Core 9550 with 8GB RAM (Xen) & Xeon Quad Core X3430 with 8GB RAM (OpenVz)
* Location - Xen: Denver, CO, USA (Test file: 100mb), OpenVz: Chicago, IL, USA
* Unmetered bandwidth for Xen VPS (optional) & Hybrid Server (by default set at 10TB, No overage charges! Request Extra at Anytime!)
* Solusvm VPS management control panel for you to reboot/reload OS/shutdown your vps.
* Basic managed - we assist you to migrate from existing cpanel servers, install software, system update, security update on best effort basis for initial setup!
* FREE port monitoring (get your FREE monitoring at Website Monitoring)
